what: AK DEC AMQA Data Management Team Tools
title: AK DEC AMQA Data Management Team Tools
text: Package AMQA data management team. Contains functions common data cleaning & wrangling steps team comes across.

title: AK DEC AMQA Data Management Team Tools
text: can install development version akairmonitor GitHub :

title: AK DEC AMQA Data Management Team Tools
text: can query internal AirVision server data : read .csv basic data export AirVision: can create OpenAir diurnal plot imported data (must follow openair package column naming conventions): can create OpenAir wind rose imported data (must follow openair package column naming conventions):
code: library(akairmonitorr) key <- API_KEY quant_460 <- query_agileweb("Quant_MOD00460", "PM25", start = "2024-05-13T00:00:00", key) |>   clean_pm25() file_path <- "C:/Data Analysis/Testing/data/haines_quant.csv" haines_quant <- read_aa(file_path) #> New names: #> • `` -> `...1` #> • `Quant_MOD00450` -> `Quant_MOD00450...2` #> • `Quant_MOD00450` -> `Quant_MOD00450...3` #> • `Quant_MOD00450` -> `Quant_MOD00450...4` #> • `Quant_MOD00450` -> `Quant_MOD00450...5` #> • `Quant_MOD00450` -> `Quant_MOD00450...6` #> • `Quant_MOD00450` -> `Quant_MOD00450...7` #> • `Quant_MOD00450` -> `Quant_MOD00450...8` #> • `Quant_MOD00450` -> `Quant_MOD00450...9` #> • `Quant_MOD00450` -> `Quant_MOD00450...10`  head(haines_quant) #> # A tibble: 6 × 10 #>   date                ambtemp co_ppb co_ppm no_ppb no2_ppb ozone_ppb pm10_contin #>   <dttm>                <dbl>  <dbl>  <dbl>  <dbl>   <dbl>     <dbl>       <dbl> #> 1 2024-01-31 00:00:00     0.6  -42.9      0   2.41    8.61      38.3           5 #> 2 2024-01-31 01:00:00     0.5  -43.2      0   2.79    8.44      39.6           3 #> 3 2024-01-31 02:00:00     0.4  -37.2      0   2.69    9.03      40.4           2 #> 4 2024-01-31 03:00:00     0.4  -34.4      0   2.34    9.4       41.0           8 #> 5 2024-01-31 04:00:00     0.2  -32.0      0   2.42   10.2       39.8          44 #> 6 2024-01-31 05:00:00    -0.4  -13.4      0   2.37    8.62      41.8          63 #> # ℹ 2 more variables: pm25 <dbl>, relhum <dbl> # plot_quant_pm25(haines_quant, "Haines") # plot_wind_rose(data, "Hourly Wind Speed (m/s) vs. Direction at the A Street Monitor 2021")

what: Query AMQA internal agileweb server for site/parameter data. — query_agileweb
title: Query AMQA internal agileweb server for site/parameter data. — query_agileweb
text: Query AMQA internal agileweb server site/parameter data.

title: Query AMQA internal agileweb server for site/parameter data. — query_agileweb
code: query_agileweb(sites, parameters, interval = NULL, start, end = NULL, api_key)

title: Query AMQA internal agileweb server for site/parameter data. — query_agileweb
text: sites Site name string. Optionally comma-separated list site names (Site names identical listed AirVision > Configuration Editors > Site/Parameter). parameters Parameter string. Optionally comma-separated list parameter names (Parameter names identical listed AirVision > Configuration Editors > Site/Parameters). interval Interval string. Defaults 001h. start Start date/time format yyyy-mm-ddTHH:mm:ss end End date/time format yyyy-mm-ddTHH:mm:ss. Defaults current time. api_key AirVision API Key - Ask Agilaire admins API keys.

title: Query AMQA internal agileweb server for site/parameter data. — query_agileweb
